ResourceHeader.Description: The objective of this radio science investigation is to determine the density, turbulence spectrum, and velocity of the coronal plasma in the acceleration regime of the solar wind. Dual-frequency ranging and Doppler data are recorded during phases of the ULYSSES superior conjunction using the spacecraft transmitters and the NASA DSN.

InformationURL.Name: NSSDC's Master Catalog
InformationURL.Description: Information about the Coronal Sounding (radio science) (SCE) experiment on the Ulysses mission.
